prompt:
Create 4 prompts for a cohesive, chronologically flowing thank-you greeting card that tells a visual story (9:16 ratio):

üé® CREATIVITY MANDATE: Be genuinely creative, unique, and innovative! Avoid generic or clich√© designs. Think outside the box, surprise with unexpected elements, use bold artistic choices, and create something truly memorable and special. Push creative boundaries while staying appropriate for the card type and tone.

Theme: "Magical
Dreamed of living in Hawaii
Now dream of your own houses
In San Francisco tech world
And New York
And Hawaii beach house
Snorkeling with fish and turtles
Wearing wetsuit


Connect the dots
The stars align
So you can have it all "
Style: üé® Watercolor
Tone: ‚ù§Ô∏è Heartfelt - sincere and emotional
To: Mele
From: little mel 
Message: "Sing your true song
Mele
"



CRITICAL: Create a cohesive visual narrative that flows chronologically through the card experience:
1. FRONT COVER: First impression - sets the scene/introduces the story
2. INTERIOR SPREAD: The heart of the experience - continuation and climax of the visual story
3. BACK COVER: Conclusion - peaceful resolution or complementary ending

Requirements:
- Flat 2D artwork for printing (not 3D card images)
- Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- IMPORTANT: Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges (small amount may be cropped in printing)
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing
- CONSISTENT visual elements throughout: same characters, color palette, lighting, art style
- Progressive visual storytelling from front ‚Üí interior ‚Üí back
- Put any text in quotes and make it clear/readable
- Each section should feel like part of the same artistic universe
- TONE: Ensure the visual mood and atmosphere matches the sincere and emotional tone throughout all sections
- INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY SAFETY: If the user mentions specific characters, brands, logos, or products, automatically replace them with original generic alternatives in your prompts. For example: replace specific character names with "cartoon mouse character" or "superhero character", replace brand names with "colorful cereal" or "sports car", etc. Create inspired-by designs that capture the essence without referencing any protected names or specific copyrighted elements. Never include actual brand names, character names, or trademarked terms in the image generation prompts
- CONTENT SAFETY: Ensure all prompts are family-friendly and appropriate for greeting cards. Avoid any content that could be flagged by safety systems including: violence, weapons, inappropriate imagery, political content, controversial topics, scary or disturbing elements, or anything not suitable for all ages. If the user requests something potentially inappropriate, redirect to positive, wholesome alternatives that capture their intent in a family-friendly way








Create prompts that flow chronologically:

1. Front Cover (Opening Scene): BE GENUINELY CREATIVE AND UNIQUE! Include "thank-you" greeting text positioned safely in the center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image). TEXT STYLE: Write the greeting text in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that matches the elegant style used inside the card - legible, flowing, and graceful with natural character and warmth. Create charming cartoon-style or stylized illustrated figures if people are needed for the theme. This is the story opening - introduce key visual elements (colors, motifs, artistic style) that will continue throughout the other sections. Think of something unexpected, innovative, and memorable that will surprise and delight the recipient. Avoid generic designs! Style: in watercolor painting style, with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds

2. Left Interior (Story Development): UNLEASH YOUR CREATIVITY! You have complete creative freedom to design whatever you want for this left interior page! This is your artistic playground - create something genuinely innovative and unexpected that feels right for a thank-you card with sincere and emotional tone. You can include: scenes, landscapes, objects, patterns, quotes, text, illustrations, realistic art, abstract art, or anything else that inspires you - but NO PEOPLE or characters unless the user specifically mentioned wanting people in their card description. Position any text safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10%). Think of something no one has done before! Surprise us with bold, imaginative, and memorable artistic choices while maintaining visual harmony with the overall card style and tone. Style: in watercolor painting style, with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds

3. Right Interior (Story Climax): BE CREATIVE WITH MESSAGE DESIGN! Include message text: "Sing your true song
Mele
" positioned safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image) integrated into beautiful, innovative decorative artwork. HANDWRITING STYLE: Write the message in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that feels elegant and personal. The handwriting should be legible, flowing, and have natural character - not overly perfect but graceful and warm. Use a nice pen-style appearance with natural ink flow and slight variations in line weight. Think of sophisticated calligraphy that's still approachable and easy to read. Make the handwriting feel genuine and heartfelt. Think beyond typical florals and patterns - create something unexpected and artistic that perfectly frames the handwritten message - NO PEOPLE or characters. This should feel like the emotional peak of the card experience, harmonizing with the left interior as a cohesive spread. Avoid clich√© designs and create something genuinely special! Use the elegant cursive handwriting style described above. Style: in watercolor painting style, with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds

4. Back Cover (Story Resolution): BE SUBTLY CREATIVE! Create a simple yet innovative decorative design that brings peaceful closure to the visual story. Reference subtle elements from the front cover but keep it minimal and serene - NO PEOPLE, just beautiful, unexpected artistic elements that go beyond typical patterns or florals. IMPORTANT: Leave the bottom-right corner area (approximately 1 inch square) completely clear and undecorated - this space is reserved for a QR code. Focus decorative elements toward the center and left side of the design. Think of something quietly beautiful and memorable that complements the overall design while being genuinely unique. This should feel like a peaceful, artistic ending that surprises with its subtle creativity. Style: in watercolor painting style, with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds

VISUAL CONTINUITY CHECKLIST:
- Same color palette across all sections
- Consistent lighting/time of day
- Same artistic techniques and brushwork
- Recurring visual motifs or symbols (but make them unique and memorable!)
- Progressive emotional journey from introduction to resolution
- Front cover: stylized cartoon/illustrated characters if people are needed for the theme
- Left interior: CREATIVE FREEDOM but NO PEOPLE unless user specifically requested people in their description
- Right interior: focus on message space with innovative decorative elements (NO PEOPLE)
- Back cover: simple yet creative decorative design without text or people
- Use simplified, friendly, charming character design if including people (front cover only)
- CREATIVITY PRIORITY: Always choose the more innovative, surprising, and memorable option over generic designs

Return JSON:
{
  "frontCover": "detailed prompt with story opening elements",
  "backCover": "detailed prompt with story conclusion elements",
  "leftInterior": "detailed prompt with story development elements",
  "rightInterior": "detailed prompt with story climax elements"
}

IMPORTANT: Create a completely unique and different interpretation for this specific card variant. Use different creative approaches, color schemes, compositions, and artistic elements while maintaining the same core theme and requirements.

generatedPrompts.frontCover:
Here is the detailed image generation prompt for the front cover:

Front cover of a greeting card with a 9:16 aspect ratio, featuring a charming watercolor illustration. The scene depicts a serene beach at twilight, with the sky transitioning from a soft pink and orange glow near the horizon to a deep indigo speckled with numerous small white stars and dotted lines forming constellations. A stylized house constellation is visible in the upper left, and a playful fish constellation is in the upper right. In the mid-ground, two silhouetted palm trees stand against the colorful sky. In the foreground, a young girl with dark hair, wearing a red outfit and a red flower behind her ear, sits on a sandy beach, looking upwards towards the stars with a sense of wonder. The sand has a textured, warm brown appearance. The words "Thank you" are written in elegant, flowing golden cursive script, positioned in the upper center of the image, clearly readable and artistically integrated. Below the girl, also in golden cursive, are the words "little mel". The overall mood is heartfelt and magical, with soft, blended watercolor brushstrokes and a warm, inviting color palette. The artwork is flat 2D, with a full-bleed background.
generatedPrompts.backCover: Back cover design for a greeting card with a celestial, starry night sky transitioning from deep indigo at the top to a soft lavender and pale pink at the bottom, rendered in a watercolor painting style. A golden, starlike constellation in the shape of a sea turtle is prominently featured in the upper left quadrant, with smaller white dots representing distant stars scattered across the gradient sky. The overall aesthetic is serene and magical, suggesting a peaceful resolution to a dreamlike journey. The design is minimalist and evocative, with no text or additional decorative elements, allowing for a clear space for a QR code in the bottom right corner. The artistic style uses soft, blended brushstrokes and a subtle paper texture, maintaining visual continuity with the whimsical, heartfelt theme of dreams and aspirations.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: Left interior page of a greeting card with a dreamlike, watercolor aesthetic. The scene depicts a stylized night sky filled with subtle, abstract watercolor clouds in deep blues and muted golds. A delicate, illuminated constellation, formed by thin yellow lines connecting glowing yellow dots, weaves across the sky. Below the sky, silhouetted against the cosmic backdrop, are three distinct architectural elements: on the left, a tall, narrow house with visible window panes; in the center, a slightly wider building with arched windows; and on the right, a more distant, open-porch style house with warmly lit windows, hinting at a tropical locale with a faint palm frond silhouette. In the lower portion of the image, the faint outlines of a city skyline are visible, transitioning into a textured expanse of deep teal and blue, suggesting water. The overall impression is one of aspiration and interconnectedness, with the constellation acting as a symbolic bridge between different dreams and locations. The watercolor technique is evident in the soft blending of colors, visible brushstrokes, and slight paper texture, creating an ethereal and heartfelt mood. The 9:16 aspect ratio is maintained.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior:
Right interior page of a greeting card designed for message space with watercolor textures and a serene underwater theme. The background features soft, blended washes of turquoise and aqua, creating the illusion of tranquil water with subtle hints of lighter tones and faint white specks suggesting light play or bubbles. Dominating the upper two-thirds of the page are stylized, golden-yellow musical notes and wavy lines that resemble musical staves, interspersed with charming, stylized yellow sea turtles and schools of matching yellow fish swimming along these musical currents. These elements are depicted with loose, expressive watercolor brushstrokes and soft, organic paint bleeds, creating a sense of gentle movement. Below the musical elements, the message "Sing your true song\nMele" is beautifully rendered in a flowing, deep blue cursive script, mimicking elegant handwriting. The script is clear, readable, and imbued with a warm, personal touch, with natural variations in line weight that suggest a pen with ink flow. The overall composition is balanced, with the visual storytelling of the marine life and music harmonizing perfectly with the heartfelt message.

Here is the prompt that could have been used to create this image:

"Watercolor painting of a greeting card interior, 9:16 aspect ratio. The background is a serene watercolor wash blending turquoise and aqua with subtle lighter tones and faint white specks. Overlaying the upper two-thirds of the image are stylized, golden-yellow musical staves and wavy lines. Swimming along these musical lines are charming, stylized yellow sea turtles and schools of matching yellow fish, all rendered with expressive watercolor brushstrokes and soft, organic paint bleeds. Positioned in the lower half of the image, the text 'Sing your true song\nMele' is written in a beautiful, flowing, deep blue cursive script. The handwriting is legible, graceful, and warm, with natural variations in line weight. The overall tone is heartfelt and whimsical, with a consistent watercolor art style, soft colors, and gentle movement."
